>
[Polytool](/Weapons.aspx?ID=300)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Agile" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=170" />
<trait label="Modular (B, P, or S)" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=271" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 27 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters from Numeria have access to the polytool_

**Favored Weapon** [Casandalee](/Deities.aspx?ID=34)

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 10 gp

**Damage** 1d6 modular

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Hands** 1

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Category** Martial

**Group** [Sword](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=15)
</row>

</column>

---

The polytool is a small metal rod with a number of simple tools folded inside. The user can extend a long ceramic blade, as well as an awl, chisel, file, [flint and steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), hook, inkpen, [magnifying glass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=31), pliers, scissors, and a small saw. The flint and steel can be used up to 10 times before needing to be replaced. Though inspired by advanced Numerian technology, the polytool is a simple enough feat of metalworking that any blacksmith could produce it—perfect for the goddess [Casandalee](/Deities.aspx?ID=34) to spread innovation farther than actual Numerian tech could reach.

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-15" />
